name: The Book of Beanjaw
description:
Beanjaw's calling is to eat all the green worms on the island. God is here to help Beanjaw realize that calling.

CONTROLS

BEANJAW:

  • Left stick/WASD : Move
  • A (xbox) /  Spacebar : Jump
  • X (xbox) / Z (keyboard) : Bite

GOD:

  • Click to lift obstacles and drag enemies out of the way. Also click to pet Beanjaw when it becomes too afraid to continue.

If the game ends abruptly that means you won!

CODE: Mayuran Thurairatnam (too cool for twitter)

ART: Ben Thomas (@benthomasaurus)

DESIGN: David Rusak (@breakfeast)

AUDIO: Ryan Roth (@dualryan)
